pageContext.claim: “Speaking of GDP, remember when I’d say it’s going to go to 3 percent pretty quickly and all of this? Well now, the Atlanta Fed just predicted 4.8 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: GDP grew 2.3 percent in 2017, Trump’s first year in office. It grew 2 percent during the first quarter of 2018. Trump was referencing an unofficial GDP growth forecast from the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta.
